      • ensureTopics

        public void ensureTopics(java.lang.String... topicNames)
        Ensure topics with the given topicNames exist.

        Topics will be creates, if they do not already exist, with a single partition and replica.

        Parameters:
        topicNames - the names of the topics to create.

      • ensureTopics

        public void ensureTopics(int partitionCount,
                         java.lang.String... topicNames)
        Ensure topics with the given topicNames exist.

        Topics will be creates, if they do not already exist, with the specified partitionCount.

        Parameters:
        topicNames - the names of the topics to create.

      • produceRows

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<GenericKey,org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.RecordMetadata> produceRows(java.lang.String topic,
                                                                                                                   java.util.Collection<java.util.Map.Entry<GenericKey,GenericRow>> recordsToPublish,
                                                                                                                   org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<GenericKey> keySerializer,
                                                                                                                   org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<GenericRow> valueSerializer,
                                                                                                                   java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Long> timestampSupplier)
        Publish test data to the supplied topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - the name of the topic to produce to.
        recordsToPublish - the records to produce.
        keySerializer - the serializer to use to serialize keys.
        valueSerializer - the serializer to use to serialize values.
        timestampSupplier - supplier of timestamps.
        Returns:
        the map of produced rows, with an iteration order that matches produce order.
